dict.string: Explore the English language on term.ly
from terminology import complete print complete("{query}")
Explore the English language on term.ly

# About
## What is term.ly?
term.ly is a way to explore the English language. It is a semantic reference. A dictionary. A thesaurus. A reference tool. Maybe more. Maybe less.
## Who is behind term.ly?
term.ly was created by [Agile Tortoise, Inc](http://agiletortoise.com/). and is provided as a free online resource.
## The Data
Most of term.ly core data is based on [WordNet](http://wordnet.princeton.edu/), a large lexical database of English, developed at Princeton University. For more details on this excellent resource, read up on the [WordNet FAQs](http://wordnet.princeton.edu/wordnet/faq/).
